original_text: Jesus Christ is the sacrifice that saves us. Jewish priests do not have the authority to receive anything from his sacrifice.
korean_text: 우리에게 제단이 있는데 장막에서 섬기는 자들은 그 제단에서 먹을 권한이 없나니

sentences.original_text: Jewish priests do not have the authority
to receive anything from his sacrifice
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 희생 제물로부터 어떤 것도 받을
